SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: EPRI (2014) Total Cost of Ownership for Current Plug-in Electric Vehicles: Update to Model 2013 and 2014 Model Year Vehicles. Report 3002004054
Assumptions: Raw data is for a typical owner-operated car with around typical annual mileage of 15765veh-km. If mileage increases, the cost is assumed to increase linearly.
